item.title: Archway Road - corner of Jacksons Lane & Highgate Avenue - TfL Street Light Broken, 30th October
item.description:
This TfL streetlight is not working yet again. I doubt it was repaired earlier in the year. It is a TfL style pole and light on a Red Route. It is not in a Haringey side road. Reported in Oct 2024 FixMyStreet ref: 6624613. Also reported in March 2023 and Jan 2022. Previous experience of TfL on FmS is that they close items without fixing them. Prove me wrong and do something that permanently solves the problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Archway Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10 Streetlights Out - Main Path South from Cafe to Tennis Courts, 30th October
item.description:
225m length of roadway from ///odds.loft.pass to ///chip.bolts.maker is in complete darkness. Circuits north and south are working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finsbury Gate, Stroud Green, London

item.title: Excessive leaves on pavement, 30th October
item.description:
Outside number 27 and 28 there seems to be an excessive amount lf leaves collected up making the pavement extremely slippery and dangerous. The section is used by multiple disabled residents on the street which puts them at risk lf serious injury as well as children and the general public. The rest of the pavement is not as bad as this section.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badsworth Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin, 30th October
